ActionBar_AccessRightCmd.Title: Share
ActionBar_AccessRightCmd.ShortHelp: Shares the selected objects with individual users, user groups, or collaborative space/organization pairs.
ActionBar_AccessRightCmd.LongHelp: Enter the name of the user, user group, or collaborative space/organization pair you want to share the object with next to the required permissions.
ActionBar_Attributes.Title: Edit properties
ActionBar_Attributes.ShortHelp: Opens the Properties widget, and provides information on an object's identity, state, and ownership.
ActionBar_Attributes.LongHelp:
You can edit the properties of the object from the widget.

Depending on the object you selected, other tabs are available from the Properties widget.
ActionBar_ChangeOwner.Title: Move
ActionBar_ChangeOwner.ShortHelp: Moves the selected objects to another collaborative space and/or organization, and can change its owner.
ActionBar_ChangeOwner.LongHelp:
Search the targeted collaborative space and organization, and select them.

To change the owner, click Change Owner, search the targeted user, and select it.

To add information about the operation, click Add Message.

This operation cannot be reversed, except by the new owner.
ActionBar_NewDrawingCmd.Title: New Drawing
ActionBar_NewDrawingCmd.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, the attributes if any, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click <uicontrol>Create and Close</uicontrol> to create only one drawing, or <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> to create another one.
ActionBar_NewPartCmd.Title: New Part
ActionBar_NewPartCmd.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, the required attributes if any, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click <uicontrol>Create and Close</uicontrol> to create only one part, or <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> to create another one.
ActionBar_NewProductCmd.Title: New Product
ActionBar_NewProductCmd.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, the required attributes if any, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click <uicontrol>Create and Close</uicontrol> to create only one product, or <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> to create another one.
ActionBar_InsertNewDrawingCmd.Title: Insert New Drawing
ActionBar_InsertNewDrawingCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new drawing and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ActionBar_InsertNewDrawingCmd.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click Create and Close to create only one drawing, or Create to create another one.
ActionBar_InsertNewPartCmd.Title: Insert New Part
ActionBar_InsertNewPartCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new part and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ActionBar_InsertNewPartCmd.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click Create and Close to create only one part, or Create to create another one.
ActionBar_InsertNewProductCmd.Title: Insert New Product
ActionBar_InsertNewProductCmd.ShortHelp: Creates a new product and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ActionBar_InsertNewProductCmd.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click Create and Close to create only one product, or Create to create another one.
ActionBar_ReserveCmd.Title: Lock
ActionBar_ReserveCmd.ShortHelp: Prevents other users from modifying the selected objects.
ActionBar_ReserveCmd.LongHelp: If applicable, select Reference to lock the object, and /or Instance to lock the usage of the object in the structure.
ActionBar_TransferOwnership.Title: Change Owner
ActionBar_TransferOwnership.ShortHelp: Modifies the owner of the selected objects.
ActionBar_TransferOwnership.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, search for a user, select it, and then click Change Owner.

You can add information about the operation in the Add Message box.
ActionBar_UnreserveCmd.Title: Unlock
ActionBar_UnreserveCmd.ShortHelp: Reverses the lock operation and allows users to modify the selected objects.
ActionBar_UnreserveCmd.LongHelp: If applicable, select Reference to unlock the object, and /or Instance to unlock the usage of the object in the structure.
